name: gobackup
description: ðŸ—„ CLI tool for backup your databases, files to cloud storages in schedully.
readme_summary: GoBackup is a CLI tool designed for application servers to schedule and automate backups of databases and files to various cloud storage providers. It supports multiple database types and storage options, offering features like encryption, compression, and scheduled execution.
key_features: Archive paths or files into a tar
Split large backup file into multiple parts
Run as daemon to backup in schedully
primary_use_case: Automated backups of databases and files to cloud storage.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent librarian meticulously archiving digital books (databases and files) into labeled cloud storage boxes (S3, GCS, etc.). The librarian uses a special tool that automatically copies and encrypts the books before placing them in the boxes. A calendar on the wall indicates a scheduled backup process. Small UI elements display progress bars and successful backup notifications. The scene is set in a well-organized digital library with soft, warm lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with clear details and a calming color scheme.

name: zebar
description: Zebar is a tool for creating customizable and cross-platform taskbars, desktop widgets, and popups.
readme_summary: Zebar is a cross-platform tool written in Rust that allows users to create customizable taskbars, desktop widgets, and popups. It provides a lightweight alternative to Electron for creating desktop widgets using native webviews, and allows users to create and install widget packs through a GUI.
key_features: Customizable taskbars, desktop widgets, and popups
GUI for widget installation and configuration
primary_use_case: Creating and customizing desktop widgets and taskbars across different operating systems.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled clockmaker meticulously assembling intricate clockwork mechanisms that power miniature desktop widgets and taskbars. Each gear represents a different system function, and the clockmaker carefully calibrates them to ensure smooth cross-platform compatibility. Small screens display snippets of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code, subtly connecting the clockwork to software. The scene is set in a cozy workshop filled with tools and blueprints, bathed in warm, inviting light. The composition is focused and detailed, with a balanced color scheme. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich textures and vibrant colors.

name: tartube
description: A GUI front-end for youtube-dl, partly based on youtube-dl-gui and written in Python 3 / Gtk 3
readme_summary: Tartube is a GUI front-end for youtube-dl, yt-dlp, and other compatible video downloaders. It allows users to easily download videos from YouTube, Twitch, Odysee, and hundreds of other sites, organize them into folders, and receive alerts for livestreams and debut videos.
key_features: GUI front-end for youtube-dl and yt-dlp
Supports YouTube, Twitch, Odysee, and hundreds of other sites
Alerts for livestreams and debut videos
Downloads temporary copies of videos for buffering
primary_use_case: Downloading videos from various online platforms using a graphical user interface.
cover_image_prompt: A librarian meticulously cataloging digital scrolls (videos) into labeled shelves representing different online platforms like YouTube and Twitch. The librarian uses a special magnifying glass that highlights the 'download' icon on each scroll before placing it on the shelf. A small screen on the librarian's desk displays a simplified Tartube interface. Digital particles float around the scrolls, representing the data being transferred. The scene is set in a bright, organized digital library with a warm color scheme. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clear details and a focus on organization.

name: AI-Researcher
description: [NeurIPS2025] "AI-Researcher: Autonomous Scientific Innovation" -- A production-ready version: https://novix.science/chat
readme_summary: The AI-Researcher repository introduces a system for automated scientific discovery. It aims to reshape the traditional research paradigm by providing full autonomy, seamless orchestration from concept to publication, advanced AI integration, and research acceleration.
key_features: Full Autonomy: Complete end-to-end research automation
Seamless Orchestration: From concept to publication
Advanced AI Integration: Powered by cutting-edge AI agents
cover_image_prompt: A lone researcher stands in a futuristic lab, nurturing a seedling labeled "Research Idea" in a pot. Robotic arms extend from the ceiling, automatically tending to the plant with data streams and code snippets. The seedling grows rapidly, blossoming into a tree bearing fruit representing published papers and scientific breakthroughs. Holographic displays show research metrics and progress. The lab is bathed in soft, glowing light, creating a sense of innovation and progress. The repository name, "AI-Researcher," is subtly displayed on a monitor. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clean details.

name: neovate-code
description: Neovate Code is a code agent to enhance your development. You can use it to generate code, fix bugs, review code, add tests, and more. You can run it in interactive mode or headless mode.
readme_summary: Neovate Code is a coding agent designed to enhance the development workflow. It offers functionalities such as code generation, bug fixing, code review, and test creation, and can be used in both interactive and headless modes.
primary_use_case: Enhancing development workflow through automated code generation, bug fixing, and testing.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect stands before a digital blueprint, using a specialized tool to automatically refine and improve the design. The blueprint represents code, with sections highlighting potential bugs and areas for optimization. The tool emits streams of digital particles that seamlessly integrate fixes and enhancements into the blueprint. Small screens display code snippets and test results, confirming the improvements. The scene is set in a brightly lit, futuristic design studio. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and vibrant colors, emphasizing clarity and efficiency.

name: demos
description: An ongoing collection of React Native animations crafted with Reanimated, Gesture Handler, and Skia.
readme_summary: The repository is a collection of React Native animation demos built using Reanimated, Gesture Handler, and Skia. It serves as a showcase and learning resource for developers interested in creating complex and performant animations in React Native applications.
primary_use_case: Demonstrating and learning advanced React Native animation techniques.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan meticulously crafting intricate clockwork mechanisms that come to life as fluid, dynamic animations on a large screen. The artisan uses tools representing Reanimated, Gesture Handler, and Skia, each adding a unique element to the animation. Digital particles flow from the tools, forming complex shapes and movements on the screen. The repository name, 'Demos,' is subtly etched onto the artisan's workbench. The scene is set in a bright, modern workshop with a focus on precision and artistry. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details.

name: mcp-pointer
description: MCP tool: let you point at DOM elements for your favorite agentic coding tool. Let AI see what you see.
readme_summary: MCP Pointer is a tool that bridges the gap between browser DOM elements and agentic coding tools. It consists of a Chrome Extension that allows users to select DOM elements via Option+Click, and an MCP Server (Node.js package) that makes the selected element's data (text content, CSS, attributes, etc.) available to AI tools like Claude Code and Cursor through the Model Context Protocol.
primary_use_case: Providing contextual information about DOM elements to agentic coding tools to enhance their understanding and capabilities.
cover_image_prompt: A detective wearing a magnifying glass is examining a website through a browser window. The magnifying glass highlights a specific DOM element, revealing its underlying code and data structure as glowing particles. The detective is connected to an AI assistant represented by a holographic interface, which displays relevant information about the selected element. The scene is set in a modern office with subtle tech elements like code snippets and data visualizations in the background. The repository name 'MCP Pointer' is subtly incorporated into the detective's desk. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: vibesdk
description: An open-source vibe coding platform that helps you build your own vibe-coding platform, built entirely on Cloudflare stack
readme_summary: The Cloudflare Vibe SDK is an open-source platform for building AI-powered web application generators. It allows users to define application requirements in natural language, which are then translated into functional applications deployed on the Cloudflare platform, making it suitable for companies building AI-powered platforms, internal development, and SaaS platforms.
primary_use_case: Building AI-powered platforms that allow users to create applications using natural language descriptions.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly robot architect sitting at a digital drafting table, listening to a user's voice and instantly constructing a vibrant, modern web application from floating code blocks. The user's voice is visualized as sound waves transforming into React, TypeScript, and Tailwind code snippets. The robot is surrounded by holographic screens displaying live previews of the app. Small UI elements and data visualizations subtly connect the scene to software development. The setting is a bright, futuristic design studio with warm lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.
